com.stickycoding.Rokon
Class Layer

java.lang.Object
  com.stickycoding.Rokon.Layer

public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object

A Layer contains your visible objects, Text, Sprites and Emitters. They are useful to layer certain objects above others.

Author:
Richard

updateMovement

public void updateMovement()
All layers must update their objects positions before they can be drawn, or tested for collisions

drawFrame

public void drawFrame(GL10 gl)
Updates all layers, and draws to the surface. There is no need to call this yourself.

Parameters:
gl -

clearLayer

public void clearLayer()
Removes everything from the layer
